ComicInfo.Summary: Prince Drakken, leader of the Vampire Nation, has set forth in motion his plan to wrest control of the symbiotes from the people he feels stole them from him - WetWorks. By kidnapping Armand Waering, the team's former benefactor, he felt he could lure WetWorks into his trap. Although they suspected whet he was up to, they were ambushed by a horde of vampires with Claymore and Dozer being captured. WetWorks tracked their fallen comrades to Drakken's underground stronghold where they found Claymore acing strange and Dozer is a ton of trouble...
ComicInfo.Title: Sacraments Of Damnation, Part 1
